title: Coghlan's Sewing Kit,Red
description: This handy, compact sewing kit from Coghlan's includes all the essentials you may need while camping, backpacking, or traveling. It includes 50 yards of thread in an assortment of colors, 8 buttons, 2 snaps, 5 safety pins, 2 straight pins, 5 needles, a needle threader, thimble and scissors. Coghlan's makes the outdoors more comfortable and enjoyable with over 450 accessories for camping, hiking, fishing, and RVing -- from cooking gear to first aid kits, insect netting, firestarters, tent repair, and more.
